sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import "../functionality.js"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Posts() { const [theme, setTheme] = useState("dark"); const [optimizersCollapsed, setOptimizersCollapsed] = useState(false); const [distributedCollapsed, setDistributedCollapsed] = useState(false); const [economicCollapsed, setEconomicCollapsed] = useState(false); const scrollToTopButtonRef = useRef(null); const toggleTheme = () => { setTheme((currentTheme) => (currentTheme === "dark" ? "light" : "dark")); }; const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth", }); }; const toggleSection = (sectionName) => { switch (sectionName) { case "optimizers": setOptimizersCollapsed(!optimizersCollapsed); break; case "distributed": setDistributedCollapsed(!distributedCollapsed); break; case "economic": setEconomicCollapsed(!economicCollapsed); break; default: break; } }; useEffect(() => { document.body.setAttribute("data-theme", theme); }, [theme]); useEffect(() => { const scrollButton = scrollToTopButtonRef.current; const handleScroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 300) { scrollButton.classList.remove("opacity-0"); scrollButton.classList.add("opacity-100"); } else { scrollButton.classList.remove("opacity-100"); scrollButton.classList.add("opacity-0"); } }; window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); useEffect(() => { const updateCollapseIcons = () => { document.querySelectorAll(".series").forEach((section) => { const sectionName = section .querySelector(".series-title") .textContent.toLowerCase() .replace(/ /g, ""); const isCollapsed = sectionName === "optimizeralgorithms" ? optimizersCollapsed : sectionName === "distributedsystems" ? distributedCollapsed : sectionName === "economicissues" ? economicCollapsed : false; const plusIcon = section.querySelector(".plus-icon"); const minusIcon = section.querySelector(".minus-icon"); if (isCollapsed) { plusIcon.style.display = "inline"; minusIcon.style.display = "none"; section.classList.add("collapsed"); } else { plusIcon.style.display = "none"; minusIcon.style.display = "inline"; section.classList.remove("collapsed"); } }); }; updateCollapseIcons(); }, [optimizersCollapsed, distributedCollapsed, economicCollapsed]); return ( <> bb.radz
